alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:20PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Erie and northeastern Crawford Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 120 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Union City, or 23 miles southeast of Erie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corry, Union City, Canadohta Lake, Lincolnville, Riceville, Spartansburg and Elgin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern Pennsylvania.
